info.name: TranSMART 17.1 - REST API V2 - Demo
info.description: Testing scripts used by The Hyve to verify the 17.1 project API calls

item.name: 1. Essentials
get token as user (and store)

request.description: Using the glowingbear credentials we get an Oauth token to allow this REST client to use our credentials to access the tranSMART database.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: Via
header.description: Informs the client of proxies through which the response was sent.

request.description: Return patients for a patient set ID. From qt_patient_set_collection.

request.description: Return observations for a list of patientIDs

item.name: 4. Observations
query observations for study

request.description: Return all observations for a specified study

item.name: query observations for concept path

request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept

item.name: 5. High-dimensional observations
query high dimensional observations for a concept path

request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept path

item.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept code

request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept code

item.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept and gene

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?biomarker_constraint={type: biomarker, biomarkerType: "genes", params: {names: ['TP53']}}&projection=zscore&constraint={type: concept, path: "\\Public Studies\\CLINICAL_TRIAL_HIGHDIM\\High Dimensional data\\Expression Lung\\"}&type=autodetect
request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept, filtered by gene symbol TP53, linked to gene id 7157 (in this case synthetically linked to probes 1007_s_at and 117_at)

item.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept and projection

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?projection=zscore&constraint={type: concept, path: "\\Public Studies\\CLINICAL_TRIAL_HIGHDIM\\High Dimensional data\\Expression Lung\\"}&type=autodetect
request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept and a certain projection

request.description: Returns the minimal value for a specified concept

request.description: Returns the maximal value for a concept

item.name: query for the average value

request.description: Returns the average value for a concept

item.name: query for the count of observations

request.description: Returns the count of the number of observations

item.name: B - Big study (NEW)
NO ACCESS - query tree for big study

request.description: Return tree nodes

item.name: TOO BIG FOR POSTMAN query all observations for big study

request.description: Return all observations for a specified study

item.name: NO ACCESS - query numerical observations for big study concept path

request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept

item.name: NO ACCESS - query categorical observations for big study

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?constraint={ "type": "or", "args": [ { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\A\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\B\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\C\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\D\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\E\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\F\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\G\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\H\\" } ] }&type=clinical
request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept

item.name: NO ACCESS - count observations for big study

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations/count?constraint={ "type": "or", "args": [ { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\A\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\B\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\C\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\D\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\E\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\F\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\G\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\H\\" } ] }
request.description: Returns the count of the number of observations

request.description: Return all files linked to given study

Link arvados collection to transmart study

Other
query for all supported fields for the field constraint
DEPRECATED get patient details

request.description: Return details for a patient

item.name: DEPRECATED get patient set details

request.description: Return the details of a patient set

item.name: query with FieldConstraint

request.description: Returning observations with a constraint on one of the supported fields.

item.name: query with ValueConstraint

request.description: Returning observations with a constraint on a numeric value.

item.name: query with Negation

request.description: Returning all observations except those matching the specified constraint (all but one patient in this case).

item.name: query for a combination of concept and value constraint

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?constraint={type=and, args=[{type=concept, path='\\Public Studies\\EHR\\Vital Signs\\Heart Rate\\'}, {type=value, valueType=NUMERIC, operator='>', value=80}]}&type=clinical
request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept, where the values are greater than 176.

item.name: query for a combination of patient and concept constraint

request.description: Return all observations for a specified patient and concept
